articles.author: Rebecca Rommen
articles.title: Germany will defend Israel against South Africa's Gaza genocide claim at ICJ - Business Insider
articles.description: The German government is backing the legitimacy of Israel's war in Gaza against Hamas and is set to intervene at the International Court of Justice.
articles.content: Germany is set to intervene on Israel's behalf at the Hague after South Africa instituted proceedings accusing Israel of genocide against Palestinians, per a press release by the German federal gover… [+2738 chars]

articles.author: Sarayu Pani
articles.title: As South Africa takes on Israel at the ICJ, lessons for India on real global leadership - Scroll.in
articles.description: What South Africa is doing at the International Court of Justice is perhaps best understood as an attempt to gain soft power through morality.
articles.content: An aspect of Indian foreign policy discourse that has remained unchanged since the Nehruvian days is Indias self-proclaimed leadership of the Global South. It is a title that Indian foreign policy ex… [+7888 chars]
